sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Flex, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import './Timelime.css';

const events = [
  { date: '2020-01-01', description: 'Event 1: Starting the Project' },
  { date: '2020-03-15', description: 'Event 2: Initial Planning Completed' },
  { date: '2020-06-10', description: 'Event 3: Prototype Development Started' },
  { date: '2020-09-20', description: 'Event 4: Prototype Completed' },
  { date: '2021-02-01', description: 'Event 5: Beta Testing Begins' },
  { date: '2021-06-30', description: 'Event 6: Product Launch' },
  { date: '2021-12-15', description: 'Event 7: Major Update Release' },
  // Add more events as needed
];

const Timeline = () => {
  return (
    <Flex flexDirection="column" alignItems="center">
      <Box
        width="2px"
        height="100%"
        backgroundColor="gray.200"
        position="absolute"
        left="50%"
        transform="translateX(-50%)"
      />
      {events.map((event, index) => (
        <Flex key={index} alignItems="center" mb="20px">
          <Box
            width="8px"
            height="8px"
            backgroundColor="teal.500"
            borderRadius="50%"
            zIndex="1"
          />
          <Box
            backgroundColor="gray.200"
            width="20px"
            height="20px"
            borderRadius="50%"
            zIndex="0"
            position="relative"
          />
          <Box ml="20px">
            <Text fontSize="md" fontWeight="bold">{event.date}</Text>
            <Text>{event.description}</Text>
          </Box>
        </Flex>
      ))}
    </Flex>
  );
}

export default Timeline;
